concept.title: User interface domain elements
concept.shortdesc: The elements in the user interface domain each have a specific semantic purpose.

dlentry.dd:
user interface control element is used to mark up UI controls, such as button names, menu items, and other objects.
Press the Submit (<uicontrol>)button to submit your form.

window title
The Configure Options window opens with your last set of selections highighted.

menu cascade
To open the Notepad, navigate to Start Programs Accessories Notepad

shortcut
Navigate to Start > Settings to open the system settings.
